title: 015: Social Media & Anarchy
description: Technology is growing lightening fast. With this growth comes both tremendous opportunity and a dark side. In this episode Sal, Adam and Justin explore where the information age is taking us and how to take advantage of the opportunity it offers.
content:encoded: Technology is growing lightening fast. With this growth comes both tremendous opportunity and a dark side. In this episode Sal, Adam and Justin explore where the information age is taking us and how to take advantage of the opportunity it offers.
